reviewText: This is basically your average DVD of 12 different models posing in places like wild west towns, golf courses, pools, etc.  The girls don't dance and there is no nudity.  As one other reviewer said, you can't play the DVD straight through--you have to choose each individual model.  Three segments feature 2 models each, and if you select one of the pair, then the other, it will give you the same scenes for both.  Unfortunately, almost all the girls wear far too much makeup (one in particular is wearing enough blush to paint a house!), and several look like they visited the same plastic surgeon (if you like "natural" beauties, look elsewhere).  Seven of the models are very average looking, two are hard-as-nails and a bit too old for this sort of video, and three are outstanding, including the cover model.  There are worse ways to spend an hour or so of your time, but all in all, this DVD is just OK.

First, take note there is not any nudity.  There are several models doing short vidoes and interviews.  3 of 9 models are knock-outs.  There are several butterfaces making up the rest.

This could have run on a weekend sydication.  Very tame.  It isn't very well put together in that you can't select play all, you have to select each model, though some scenes are two models, but they list same one under each individual model.  Redundant.

For looks at a few hot girls this is fine.  For anything more, a waste of money.

Hot girls in bikinis and bras. This one does it right.
So many model videos are of such bad quality that it ruins the viewing experience...not this one. Shot well, sounds good...and oh, yeah...looks good :)

I've seen a couple of these girls in magazines and other high-end sites. Not just neighbor girls and a handy cam kind of stuff.

The cover model is white HOT too!

This dvd has surprisingly high production values and the babes are almost all high quality with a couple of stunners. Great lighting,music and locations. Each girl is shot with different outfits including bikinis and also interviewed.
This would be perfect for background of party or in limo.
Defintely a good one to add to the collection.
